extension_name.message: Cursor Elegant - Cursor Personalitzat per a Google Docs

extension_description.message: Canvia el cursor per defecte per un cursor elegant i animat!

infoMessage.message: Si no funciona, torna a carregar Google Docs.

thankYouMessage1.message: Thank you for downloading the Stylish Cursor extension! We hope you enjoy the enhanced typing experience.

thankYouMessage2.message: Visit our GitHub repository to contribute, report issues, or suggest new features!

ratingMessage1.message: If you're enjoying the enhanced typing experience, please consider rating our extension on the Chrome Web Store!

ratingMessage2.message: Your feedback helps us improve and reach more users who would love this extension.
